Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Environment

  • public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that simulates an environment of nodes in a grid. The nodes can detect its neighbours in 8 directions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Environment

        public Environment(int width,
           int height)
        Constructor for Environment. the nodes will be placed in a grid and the total number of nodes is width * height
        Parameters:
        width - the number of columns
        height - the number of rows

        Parameters:

        p - the nodes position
